meanings: actually, in fact, in reality, as a matter of fact; (거의) practically, virtually
Noun being actual, being as a matter of fact, being virtual
a virtual head of the company

examples.korean: He kept his daughters in virtual purdah. 발음듣기 그는 자기 딸들을 사실상 격리시켜 생활하게 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He kept his daughters in virtual purdah. 발음

examples.korean: Polio has been virtually eradicated in Brazil. 발음듣기 브라질에서 소아마비는 사실상 근절되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Polio has been virtually eradicated in Brazil. 발음

examples.korean: The sound is virtually undetectable to the human ear. 발음듣기 그 소리는 인간의 귀로는 사실상 감지할 수 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The sound is virtually undetectable to the human ear. 발음

examples.korean: By 1981 the docks had, to all intents and purposes, closed. 발음듣기 1981년이 되자 그 부두는 사실상 폐쇄된 것이나 마찬가지였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: By 1981 the docks had, to all intents and purposes, closed. 발음

examples.korean: Hospital beds were scarce and medicines were practically non-existent. 발음듣기 병원 병상은 부족했고 의약품은 사실상 존재하지도 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Hospital beds were scarce and medicines were practically non-existent. 발음
